title: Big Five Learning-Based Learning Design and Educational Management Simulation Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theories and team project experience
context.additional_context: Experiencing Real Classroom Scenarios in VR Environments and Establishing Collaborative Learning Environments Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can apply the Big Five Learning Model (Connection, Construction, Exploration, Dialogue, Reflection) in VR simulation environments
Learners can improve collaboration and communication skills by over 20% through team-based task performance
Learners can revise and improve their learning designs based on formative assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
